CustomField.description: Administrators populate this text field with the name of the sObject Type of record they want to use as the context object for conditional display criteria. This field works in conjunction with the Conditional Display Criteria field. Optionally, use keywords to tell the system to capture records that are not in session data. By default, it is blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the API name of the sObject Type for the conditional display criteria. Optionally, enter a keyword to capture records that are not in session data.
CustomField.label: Conditional Display Criteria Context
